data.subject: Jingle Bells (Originally Remastered)
data.lyric:
Jingle Bells
 Jingle Bells
 Jingle all the way
 Oh what fun it is to ride
 In a one horse open sleig

data.subject: Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow! (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Oh, the weather outside is frightful
 But the fire is so delightful
 And since we've no place to go

data.subject: Silent Night (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Silent night
 Holy night
 All is calm
 All is bright
 Round yon virgin mother and child
 Holy infant

data.subject: O Come All Ye Faithful (Adeste Fideles) (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Oh come all ye faithful
 Joyful and triumphant
 Oh come ye, oh come ye to Bethlehem
 Come and behold

data.subject: Christmas Dreaming (Remastered)
data.lyric:
I'm doing my Christmas dreaming a little early this year
 No sign of snow around
 And yet I go aroun

data.subject: I`ll Be Home For Christmas (Originally Remastered)
data.lyric:
I'll be home for Christmas
 You can plan on me
 Please have snow and mistletoe
 And presents 'neath

data.subject: Mistletoe And Holly (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Oh, by gosh, by golly
 It's time for mistletoe and holly
 Tasty pheasants, Christmas presents
 Count

data.subject: While The Angelus Was Ringing (Remastered)
data.lyric:
While the Angelus was ringing, calling for the evening pray'r
 I could hear the choir singing and I

data.subject: The Twelve Days Of Christmas (Remastered)
data.lyric:
On the first day of Christmas my true love sent to me
 Twelve lords leaping, Eleven ladies dancing,

data.subject: Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Have yourself a merry little Christmas
 Let your heart be light
 From now on our troubles
 Will be o
